website_summaries.verdict: Similarly priced walkers offer better portability and more interactive features.
pros: We love the removable toy station which keeps babies entertained for hours

customer_reviews.title: This walker does not allow "sideway" movement
customer_reviews.text: The walker fits well and the toys are cute, if a bit simplistic. However, the walker's fatal design flaw are its wheels that only go back and forth; they do not spin around their axes. This is a problem when the little "driver" wants to go sideways, which happens about half of the time. Logically, I think a walker should allow one to go in every which direction, just like one could go if they were in fact... walking. This lack of maneuvering flexibility caused us to return it.
customer_reviews.author: the_fox

customer_reviews.title: the front wheels are made horribly, any hair
customer_reviews.text: the front wheels are made horribly, any hair, or lint gets stuck in between the wheel, they stop rolling!! hence, scratching your wood floors and frustrating baby. i removed wheels, and put in bathtub, used nair hair removal lotion. takes a long time and you still need to try and jam a sharp item in between to remove the hair. NIGHTMARE, people are buying new wheels, and of course it is happening again. its a definite manufacture problem, good luck..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Took the safety pieces off the bottom (we don't have any stairs) so it's easier to roll on the carpet. Grand baby is 1 now and still likes it. The toy he doesn't play with much. Took it off so it doesn't obstruct his view and you have a place to put snacks. Does play with it sometimes on the floor but didn't buy it for the toy. He is very ruff and RAMS everything but it's still holding up. He was about 6 months old when we got it and he's a year old now.
customer_reviews.author: Blenda Barnard

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have swiveling back wheels, bottoms out over slight ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have swiveling back wheels, bottoms out over slight bumps (raised floors, etc.) Difficult for the baby to figure out how to propel itself when it won't move in all directions. Entertainment is limited with only a single button to push that flashes and makes only two alternating noises. Overall a very limited walker that is not up to standards set by other Baby Einstein products.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Not very adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Has three "adjustable" sizes which is basically little clips that shorten the actual cloth seat. Pretty janky and wobbly. The baby really liked the little toy. I liked that the seat is a little small so baby can get in at a younger age, which i know isnt recommended, but we did and put a little blanket so he can stay held up, but I watch him the whole time and don't leave him alone. Back wheel only move back and forward. Front wheels 360°. Doesn't move well on my carpet with no baby in it or when I moved it with him in it.
customer_reviews.author: J&M T

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Overall baby and I love this little walker. It was super easy to put together, it’s lightweight and fun for her to play in. She loves being able to follow me around the house. The only downside is I don’t think it’s able to be laid flat and stored away? If it is I haven’t figured it out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Adelee

customer_reviews.title: Looks and performs well, sucky talking feature
customer_reviews.text: The whole multi-lingual speaking feature is annoying AF to be honest. Besides English, this Baby Einstein product also speaks everything in Spanish and French. No way to disable the other languages, or change between the ones you want like other toys, even other Baby Einstein toys. Who in the world thought that it would great and not confusing to say everything in 3 languages when designing this thing? That's my only complaint really, lacking that 5th star.
customer_reviews.author: Victor K.

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when he was six months old and now he is almost a year old. We don't really put him inside of it anymore, but he absolutely loves pushing it around the house and still plays with the little toys and musical stuff. I would recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Walker
customer_reviews.text: My daughter took to this walker within minutes. It maneuvers well on hardwood and tile. We don't have carpet so I can't speak to it's efficacy there. She loved the freedom this walker gave her. She outgrew it when she was about 10-months old BUT she is also in the 99% for height, so most kids will probably get a lot longer use out of this than she did. She is 13-months now, and is walking, and still likes to grab ahold of the walker and push it around the living room even though she can no longer "ride" in it.
customer_reviews.author: rforer

customer_reviews.title: Product does not last. Wheels stop rolling!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product less than a month ago for our 8 month old. He absolutely loved it for the first couple weeks but now hates it because the front wheels do not roll anymore! They no longer rotate and as a result it is very hard for him to get around. The front wheels are poorly made and without them working, the product is useless. Poorly made. Be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can see her delight in being able to cruise the house and explore
customer_reviews.text: Our 7 month old grandaughter loves this walker. She is not yet completely crawling and is always on the move. You can see her delight in being able to cruise the house and explore. The narrow base is perfect for our small rooms and entries from one area of house to another. She loves all the sounds and interactive toys as well. We pd the extra for this model as it was advertised as height adjustable. It is not and that is our only disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Best Walker
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter and absolutely love it!!! It was very easy to set up (I am terrible at directions and I could do it myself with a nine months old climbing all over me). It is easy to adjust the height and I love that you easily attach toys to it as well. My daughter has no problem navigating it around our house. It's the perfect size even for our narrow hallways!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Colton

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy, but not made for short babies
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this. Unfortunately I had to bend the metal frame some for his feet to reach, he is on the shorter side (25 inches) and even with the lowest seat setting he couldn't reach the floor to move the walker. He is able to get onto the area rug from the hardwood with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: No good for carpet
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not made to go over Carpet Very difficult for my 7month old baby to move when even on low pro carpet Removed rubber inserted on the bottom so he could move better but made walker dangerous to tilt so put them back on. Will look into ordering other walker soon
customer_reviews.author: Mr T

customer_reviews.title: Love the sounds, baby has a great time
customer_reviews.text: Baby has loved this since he was 3 months old (he's an early sitter). It does not work on carpet but does great on hardwood or tile. Now that he's 5 months he's toodling around front and backwards, and loves the toys. The turtle clicks and is fascinating to him, and the sound button makes songs, bubbles, and a ship's horn in random order - he loves to press it to see which sound he gets! We're big fans of Baby Einstein and this item is one of our favorites!
customer_reviews.author: SaraS

customer_reviews.title: Does not fold down...
customer_reviews.text: Was a little misleading showing this item get stored under bed.. Made it look like it was a feature.. In fact you have to take it apart and it's not easy. And the seat fabric is all that's holding baby In, doesn't seem like it will last to long.
customer_reviews.author: A Mora

customer_reviews.title: great walking learner and gives little kids mobility
customer_reviews.text: really helped our daughter to walk, makes her feel mobile and enjoyed it a lot being in the walker love the fact that it is hight adjustable to the growing length of their legs. also the plastic bouncers save your furniture, highly recommend it! not for small /thight places though I would say.
customer_reviews.author: xander

customer_reviews.title: Nice walker, but it does not roll on carpet
customer_reviews.text: Nice walker, but it does not roll on carpet, which means it must to used in the Kitchen for us. Of course, since keeping the twins in the kitchen is not safe they rarely enjoy the walkers. In addition, it does not fold easily or at all. I have not been able to fold it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tipped over 4 times!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this UNTIL..... Our 10month old son flipped sideways 4 times!!! Needless to say, we returned this walker! He tipped sideways when leaning to reach for something and the wheels werent caught on anything! He is a 10 month who is taller but still within weight limits given. We thought this walker was great and works smoothly but I just cannot put him back in there for fear of him hitting his head/face AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Rikki B.

customer_reviews.title: Keeping baby entertained
customer_reviews.text: Keeps kids entertained and confined to a specific area. We had other Baby Einstein developmentals and lime the use of colors and sounds. There are also educational aspects associated with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Forton

customer_reviews.title: He Loves This Walker. So Do I.
customer_reviews.text: My 8-month old loves this. He moves quickly with great ease. I love the narrow width frame. Our living areas are pretty tight but this walker allows him to move through tight areas. The seat cover can be removed fairly easy to wash. We have a drop of about an inch from the den to the kitchen. The walker does not allow him to cross the threshold because it's not level with the kitchen floor. It treats the drop like a stair almost and prevents him from moving any further. I would highly recommend this walker.
customer_reviews.author: CeDeeTee

customer_reviews.title: Please add weight limit to product description!
customer_reviews.text: Well I did not see in the description any where that there was a weight limit. So needless to say, my chunky little grandson exceeds the limit stated on the box. Also the box had stickers on it like it had been placed in a yard sale or something but it was not opened or appeared used. The walker is not collapsible like the picture shows but it is a nice walker.
customer_reviews.author: L. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble. Easy to clean. Sturdy. Both my kids loved it, and now it's been gifted to my niece. Still basically looks new after 3 kids! Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Broken...
customer_reviews.text: We are so UPSET! We were waiting the arrival of this, we got it today! And was putting it together and the plastic was broken on the main part you play with. And is so sharp you could for sure cut yourself so now we don’t know if we should just return it. Ugh when it comes to your baby you wouldn’t want this to happen! And there was no damage on the box at all but it was just broken? Don’t know what happend🥺
customer_reviews.author: Randy A.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and my grandson loves it more than his big expensive one at his parent's house! Within s week he figured out how to walk in it and cruises around great! Doesn't roll great on longer carpet, but not a big problem for me, I put a rug with longer shag in the spots I don't want him to go and that works great! He likes to jump when he is excited and I was worried it might tip over but it doesn't!
customer_reviews.author: Northern Debutante

customer_reviews.title: Came broken - Paid extra for piano but didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: This came broken. Paid extra for the piano and it doesn't make any music. Didn't feel like boxing back up, sending back and getting replacement. Super disappointed as we ordered this so my son would have it while on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: HENROCOMPANY

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby
customer_reviews.text: This is a very durable walker. She slams into things and it still hold up. She is now 10 months old and still uses it. The songs it plays are cute as well. Breaks down nicely for trips
customer_reviews.author: melony

customer_reviews.title: The grand baby loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson LOVED this walker! He had a great time tooling through the house and enjoyed the little toy that was attached. My only complaint is the quality of the wheels and the plastic tabs that held the toy in place. By the time he was through using it at 12 months old he had broken the toy off and two of the wheels had flattened and didn't roll very well. The plastic wheels were flat in a few places causing the difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. M

customer_reviews.title: Went together very easily and am not disappointed with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Just put this together at home. Went together very easily and am not disappointed with the quality. However, the “easy storage” is anything but. You have to completely disassemble the base in order to store this flat. I have a very small house and was planning on stowing under a price of furniture whenever not in use. Now I’m either going to return it or have to find a place in my house where I can just keep it assembled. The descriptions and videos were very deceptive on this.
customer_reviews.author: Adam DeLong

customer_reviews.title: Could be unsafe.
customer_reviews.text: Steering wheel is too hard, and hard plastic I-bolt looking things on the left and right have a point on them. All in reach of hitting head. He loves it, but mom and dad feel safety should have played a role in the design.
customer_reviews.author: JSM

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fold up like picture suggests ! !
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY disappointed to discover that this walker doesn't fold up for storage like the picture suggests ! ! You have to take it apart ! ! I was planning to quickly fold it up and slide it under the bed when not in use but instead I broke 2 finger nails trying to push in the buttons to take it apart and then put it away in many pieces ! !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't love or hate this product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted my son to be able to venture around upright with some help as he can't walk yet. I don't love or hate this product. It's just okay. The front wheels will go in any direction but the back only go forward and back (I'm sure there's reasons for this) so my son would go forward and get stuck because he couldn't maneuver the back wheels. Just okay.
customer_reviews.author: NEMommy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Cheap and dangerous
customer_reviews.text: The 3rd time I used it, it snapped in half as I was putting it on the seat and it hit my baby in the face and cut her. Very upset about the poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Baby approved!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my 6 month old nephew. He likes all of the fun features and is able to manipulate them. Fairly easy to assemble. The only disappointment is that the height adjustments (snaps on the underside of the cloth seat) aren’t as significant as I thought they would be. He is 27 inches long and the lowest setting was still a tad to high.
customer_reviews.author: Frances V Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Finally a light weight baby Walker like they used to make them in the old days.
customer_reviews.text: The best light weight baby Walker I've come across in a long time. It's as light weight as they used to make them back in the old days.Dislike how bulky and heavy they make them these days. If your looking for a walker that's easy for baby to walk in,this is it. Also the fun colors and toys on this Walker keep baby busy and entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Kan

customer_reviews.title: I love the Baby Einstein walker
customer_reviews.text: I love the Baby Einstein walker. It has enough activities for my grandson to engage with. He at the stage of reaching for things. Of course everything goes in his mouth. Even if he cannot reach it, he bends to put his month on it.
customer_reviews.author: elmonda

customer_reviews.title: My daughter hates crawling and wants to walk. I ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter hates crawling and wants to walk. I bought this to help her explore our home in a safe way with less toppling. It worked! She loves it and the smile on her face when she realized she was mobile was priceless.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, but doesn't store as easily as I thought...
customer_reviews.text: Great walker! Compact for our apartment and cute toy. Very easy to assemble, but I didn't realize, based on the pictures, that I would pretty much have to disassemble the entire thing to store under my bed, so we'll just leave it out. It doesn't fold down. We like it a lot overall! My toddler loves pushing the baby around in it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: First able I get this for my little one and I like it but after a month of use it is stop working even if replaced the battery.so I returned and get another style
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Price
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it! I do wish there were a few more things that lit up or made sounds, but he's mostly focused on cruising around the house when he is in it anyway. It's a good size, isn't excessively bulky, it's sturdy, and he seems to move around pretty effortlessly in it. We purchased this for him when he was 6months old and 17lbs and he fit perfectly in it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce T. Christ

customer_reviews.title: He loves this walker and with so much room to roam he is having a fun time. We are too as we see he ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a pleasure to see our grandson enjoying our new home. He loves this walker and with so much room to roam he is having a fun time. We are too as we see he going about with such a happy spirit!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Y. Polanco

customer_reviews.title: Rolls easy!
customer_reviews.text: Best one out there! Rolls easy. Only thing a little annoying are the edges that stick off of the wheels. Usually always catches something. Other than that though I think it rolls better than others. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bad wheels
customer_reviews.text: The wheels on this thing suck and the toys on it weren't much fun. I returned it and got a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerbread Mom

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: When I received the walker, you could tell that I was once used before by someone else because there was scratches all over it. When I finally put the walker up, I noticed the music book was only lighting up but was not playing any music. I tried changing the batteries but the same problem happened. I dismounted everything and gladly sent it back. Very disappointed that I received a product that was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Elsha W

customer_reviews.title: Great walker...
customer_reviews.text: A good walker. Our son has enjoyed it. It doesn’t work on carpet. We didn’t expect it to, but just throwing in here that we tried and it didn’t work well. I love the wheels in front and how they turn 360°. Really helps with movement.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Harris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little walker!
customer_reviews.text: I love this, but more importantly my son loves it! It is super easy to put together, and comes apart easily if we want to take it to grandma and grandpa's for a day. Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Gives mom a break too
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and the babies love it. Gives mom a break to
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Rohaidy

customer_reviews.title: New experience!
customer_reviews.text: Like the extra rings to put baby's faves on and be able to change periodically. Moves fairly easily around corners. Wish ring sliders could go completely around the circle of caterpillar. I purchased so that baby could have a floor toy and hoping it gets easier the more I remove it. I love how colorful it is. Little one (9 months now) actually turned and looked at all the pictures on the back of the seat before playing with the toys first time in! I like it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is small
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is small, but it doesn't work right the wheels do not roll right I have hard wood floors even when I push it it drags the ground. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: mom2twinsplus1

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. My toddler is a happy camper. My wife worried about my toddler not being able to move around, but he was able to move and turn.
customer_reviews.author: Hidden Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Terrible construction and impossible to put together
customer_reviews.text: For the love of all that is good, DO NOT BUY THIS!! It’s impossible to put together. The bottom part doesn’t click together properly making it so frustrating and not even suitable for use. One side will go in, but the other side doesn’t fit and now I can’t even take it apart to send back!!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Matthias

customer_reviews.title: This infant walker has a nice and new look in comparison to the tradational ones
customer_reviews.text: This infant walker has a nice and new look in comparison to the traditional ones. Overall it's a sturdy and safe product. The walker is harder for the child to push and navigate, only in the introductory stage. The front wheels move in all directions, but the back wheels only move forward and backward. The cut out design at the back makes it easier to manoeuvre around doorways and corners.
customer_reviews.author: Tanika

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product, very nice and good material, my baby love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Front toy piece is NOT designed to be (easily) removable.
customer_reviews.text: The removable toy in the front is IMPOSSIBLE to take off without a lot of force and a flathead screw driver. I recommend that they stop advertising it as that, since its not designed to be easily removable. Also it takes 3 AA batteries and only does 1 trick (1 push button lights up and makes sounds). Overall though the build/materials quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: tayaba

customer_reviews.title: great walker. Safe sturdy and speaks in three languages
customer_reviews.text: great walker. Safe sturdy and speaks in three languages. My great grandson is entertained for a minute or two (not literally)
customer_reviews.author: Melba

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Designed. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly designed. If you want your toes to be hurt by your kid get them this walker. The plastic cover which covers the wheels have a gap which will fit your toes and the plastic will scratch your toes. Throwing this walker in the trash and getting a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Priyesh

customer_reviews.title: Would like it even more if it had a rubber bumper ...
customer_reviews.text: Would like it even more if it had a rubber bumper design within the trim of the tray area and extended feet. It's concerning every time it bumps into my kitchen cabinets or stainless steel appliances.
customer_reviews.author: F.Mass

customer_reviews.title: Not much activity
customer_reviews.text: Nice except for the mounted toy station. The description said: •"Steering wheel activates lights and fun ocean sounds." Actually, the only light is the top button on the steering wheel and the sounds are limited. Seems like Baby Einstein could have done better. Wish I had researched better for one with more "things to do" but I trusted the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Esther D. Hammer

customer_reviews.title: My son loved this walker
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this walker! He enjoyed running up and down our halls and doing "doughnuts" in our kitchen! It definitely helped in teaching him how to walk. Though it did cause him to go up on his tip toes for a bit when walking outside of the walker. He loved the wheel with the noise and lights and most of all the independence this gave him before he could walk on his own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves this. Sure she's a pain in the butt running over my toes when I'm doing dishes, but she sure gets a laugh out of it! She has a blast whenever she can roll around in this thing!
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: For my grandson
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my newest grandson for Christmas. I haven't pulled it out of the box yet. I will update once we take it out of the box and put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: ... loves his walker he runs all over the house great super fast service good price
customer_reviews.text: Wow my grandson loves his walker he runs all over the house great super fast service good price also
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Music does not play
customer_reviews.text: I love the walker itself. But the music part is defective on the one I received. No combination of new batteries seem to work and I feel it's much more of a hassle to take the thing apart and return it to receive a new one. I just wish there was a way to just get a new top piece with music instead of returning the entire thing.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Not what I originally wanted but better
customer_reviews.text: Its bright and coloryl. It says things in three languages can't turn it off but I like it. Bird chirps when you push it and it has two yellow hooks on each side to hang babies favorite toys. Worth the money all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old grandson loves this walker. He gets so excited each time he uses it. The seat isn't a real seat...it is for those babies that can stand most of the time. The openings are small for sitting but just right for standing. A quick sit down will work but your child should be attempting to stand in order to get use out of this walker.
customer_reviews.author: bejbrown

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Baby is getting the hang of it quickly, he just needs to learn how to reverse. Good purchase and price!
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is not the easist walker to maneuver. We purchased a walker, so that our son could be in the kitchen with us, otherwise he is crawling around the floor between our legs, and i'm afraid i'll drop something hot on him. As others have said, the wheels don't swivel, and one of the back wheels on mine is always sticking. It's also not easy to remove the toy bar. It does work for us, as we can set him in it, with some snacks, but he will start crying when he tries to walk and it won't go anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I really like these, except that they don't fold down
customer_reviews.text: I really like these, except that they don't fold down....which makes them take up a lot of space when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: cute little bear 101

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and perfect for tight spaces/doorways
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! So happy i researched this. My doorways are tight and this fits perfectly around my house. I put it together quickly and with ease. Would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Z

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. Easy for my son to maneuver easy to assemble easy to clean light weight but safe. Doesn’t completely destroy my feet when he runs into them lol
customer_reviews.author: alexis

customer_reviews.title: My sons love this thing
customer_reviews.text: My sons love this thing. Works well. Had to put WD40 on the front wheels because they would be a little rough to move around, but thats not a huge deal. What I didnt like is that the toy is incredibly hard to remove (it required batteries) and the tabs on mine broke.
customer_reviews.author: rbhgsi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The seat is easy to take off to wash. The toy part comes off for easy cleaning. I liked it and my baby had a good use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Castro

customer_reviews.title: Given as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift and the parents and baby love it. Keeps baby busy and stimulated.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Slim babies under 20lb
customer_reviews.text: This item is great. If ur child is under 20lb and slim. If your baby is chunky like my son is with fat yummy legs. I wouldnt recommend this item. His legs did not go through the leg wholes. Lol reason why i returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has been by far he WORST purchase I’ve ever made
customer_reviews.text: This has been by far he WORST purchase I’ve ever made. The wheels are tiny and do not turn well. The design also makes it difficult for the walker to move on hardwood or carpet. The steering is atrocious. The musical features doesn’t even work. I put brand new batteries in and nothing! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Baby loved walker, as the parent not so much..
customer_reviews.text: My baby loved being able to get around in this walker, but this has left me with bruises all over my feet and ankles from my child running into me. My dogs are terrified, as it legitimately hurts when he hits you with the walker.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Cota

customer_reviews.title: ... stars is because the attached toys are a little boring - thankfully it has hooks that you can clip ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this - the only reason I give 4 stars is because the attached toys are a little boring - thankfully it has hooks that you can clip other toys.
customer_reviews.author: RI_RN♡

customer_reviews.title: Can't use for intended purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Our son can't reach the floor. By the times he is old enough to "walk" in it he will be actually walking. The wheels DO NOT role on carpet and it is nearly impossible to drag with the baby in it. It is also very difficult to direct which way it should move.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby G.

customer_reviews.title: It's oK
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble but the removable toy isn't so removable and I forgot to but the battery's in it. I've tried to take it apart but it feels and seems it will brake. My 10 month old doesn't care for the accessories on it he just likes to run in it
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Stable. The button seems a little hard to push ...
customer_reviews.text: Stable. The button seems a little hard to push. Only the front wheels really turn, but it's not that hard for my son to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent walker
customer_reviews.text: Excellent walker. Sturdy, rolls easily front, backwards and sideways. Bright colorful background and colorful toys. My granddaughter loves it. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JoannR

customer_reviews.title: It seems sturdy, but very hard for baby to use
customer_reviews.text: Wheels don't turn well. It seems sturdy, but very hard for baby to use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Risdal

customer_reviews.title: My 5 month gets around well with it. We ...
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month gets around well with it. We use it on smooth surfaces only as it is hard for him to get around on thick carpet! He likes to randomly hit the buttons for the sounds. Makes him a little more independent.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hong

customer_reviews.title: Shipped on time, I actually received it sooner than ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipped on time, I actually received it sooner than I expected. Was exactly as described except the process to fold it up for storage is a lot more involved than the description stated but since it's something that gets used on a daily basis that's really not a big deal. My daughter loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Hard to navigate.
customer_reviews.text: Way too hard to turn and pulls to the right. It reminds me of my old Nissan Xterra.
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: Guess my baby is too strong
customer_reviews.text: Great open backed Walker so baby heels don't get hurt, but my 7 month old ripped the musical play station off and broke the clips that hold in on!
customer_reviews.author: Vcambo

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, its just what we wanted... my baby is not quite tall enough yet to walk with it, so i guess we'll have to wait and see. one thing i don't like about it is that it will not work, at all, on carpet. I also wish it had more fun things for the baby to play with.
customer_reviews.author: emily unis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Baby loved this until he could walk, still tries to get in it from time to time
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's well made I just wish when it says it ...
customer_reviews.text: It's well made I just wish when it says it adjusts down it meant more than an inch by undoing the seat strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Baby did not fit in it even at the highest adjustment and material is cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: My baby’s favorite toy. He loves it worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small apartments
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for small areas. I gave it 4 stars because it doesn't fold.
customer_reviews.author: mep

customer_reviews.title: Came to me broken
customer_reviews.text: It came to me broken with 1/3 buttons not working. Since I was a new mom I didn't have time to repackage it and send it back in, so we used it broken. I never had anything come to be broken before.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little walker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little walker! It is narrow and small so it can easily fit through doorways! It is inexpensive and entertaining! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: He's just beginning to understand how to move his feet, to make his walker go.. Its a world of new experience and exploring. Its a marvelous walker with toys and safety factors.. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: mareleigh

customer_reviews.title: ... complaint is that this does not fold up or easily taken apart for storage
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that this does not fold up or easily taken apart for storage. However the good news is that I bought it for my nephew and he loves it! My sister said it has been her saving grace.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this walker in June and after 1 month, the tread from the tire tore completely off the wheel. Our son loves using it but we were completely shocked that this happened. We would never have expected for something like this to happen to a Baby Einstein product.
customer_reviews.author: Rizay

customer_reviews.title: moves around easily, comfy
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it, not big, moves around easily, comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Playtime
customer_reviews.text: This is a great walker! My grandson loves it! It is lightweight yet sturdy enough that he goes everywhere in it!
customer_reviews.author: Joann Hatter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and shape just wish the music last longer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Caterpillar & Friends Discovery Walker
product_meta.description: Color:BlueBrighten your baby’s day with the Baby Einstein Caterpillar and Friends Discovery Walker. Before your baby takes their first steps, the walker’s unique elliptical frame provides a sturdier platform to explore the world on two feet. Your baby will love the freedom to follow their sense of adventure, and their favorite toys are along for the ride. Discover classical melodies, play with the bead chaser and squeaker toys, and activate lights and sounds with numbered piano keys. As your baby grows, the activity center can be removed for fun floor play.
feature_bullets: Encourages your baby’s independent, adventure-seeking spirit
Unique elliptical frame gives a sturdier platform
Engaging activity station can be removed for floor play
3 height positions; high seat back for more support
Easy to assemble, easy to clean and seat pad is machine-washable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars675 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
